subject: Management
title: Culture During Crisis
description: Learn Culture During Crisis in one minute.

hook.text: During COVID, some companies thrived culturally. Others imploded. The difference was pre-existing trust.

buildup.text: Crisis doesn't create culture. It reveals it. What you built before the storm determines survival.

discovery.text: Organizations with strong cultures before a crisis recover faster because trust is already established.

twist.text: Crisis is also the best time to reset culture. People are open to change when the old way clearly broke.

climax.text: Communicate constantly. Be transparent about unknowns. Protect people. Culture strengthens under honest leadership.

punchline.text: Crisis reveals your culture. Make sure it's one worth revealing.

quiz.question: What happens to organizational culture during a crisis?
options: Crisis reveals the existing culture rather than creating a new one
Every crisis automatically destroys organizational culture
Culture is irrelevant during a crisis since survival takes priority
